Name: Insanely Twisted Shadow Planet
About the game: In this Insanely Twisted, 2-D action-adventure game, explore unique environments and battle bizarre creatures as you make your way toward the center of the mysterious Shadow Planet! Solve complex puzzles and upgrade your ship with alien technology as you fight to save your home world. Key Features Striking and appealing visual style by renowned artist Michel Gagn√©. Innovative and intuitive puzzle design mixed with intense action sequences. Unique and visually stunning creatures and environments. Rich worlds and captivating back stories. Explore the worlds of Insanely Twisted Shadow Planet with friends with multiplayer.
